item.title: Headphones Deprecation Notice
item.description: Due to compatibility and build issues caused by a lack of upstream development, we have decided to deprecate our Headphones container.
item.content: Due to compatibility and build issues caused by a lack of upstream development, we have decided to deprecate our Headphones container.

item.title: New Container: Headphones
item.description: We have released a new container for Headphones! Headphones is an automated music downloader for NZB and Torrent, written in Python. It supports SABnzbd, NZBget, Transmission, µTorrent and Blackhole.
item.content:
We have released a new container for Headphones!

Headphones is an automated music downloader for NZB and Torrent, written in Python. It supports SABnzbd, NZBget, Transmission, µTorrent and Blackhole.
